argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dpjfval.1 | |- ( ph -> G dom DProd S ) |
| 2 |  | dpjfval.2 | |- ( ph -> dom S = I ) |
| 3 |  | dpjlem.3 | |- ( ph -> X e. I ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_dprdf2 | |- ( ph -> S : I --> ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( S : I --> ( SubGrp ` G ) -> S Fn I ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> S Fn I ) |
| 7 |  | #P_fnressn | |- ( ( S Fn I /\ X e. I ) -> ( S |` { X } ) = { <. X , ( S ` X ) >. } ) |
| 8 | 6, 3, 7 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( S |` { X } ) = { <. X , ( S ` X ) >. } ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( G DProd ( S |` { X } ) ) = ( G DProd { <. X , ( S ` X ) >. } ) ) |
| 10 | 4, 3 | #P_ffvelrnd | |- ( ph -> ( S ` X ) e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_dprdsn | |- ( ( X e. I /\ ( S ` X ) e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) -> ( G dom DProd { <. X , ( S ` X ) >. } /\ ( G DProd { <. X , ( S ` X ) >. } ) = ( S ` X ) ) ) |
| 12 | 3, 10, 11 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( G dom DProd { <. X , ( S ` X ) >. } /\ ( G DProd { <. X , ( S ` X ) >. } ) = ( S ` X ) ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_simprd | |- ( ph -> ( G DProd { <. X , ( S ` X ) >. } ) = ( S ` X ) ) |
| 14 | 9, 13 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( G DProd ( S |` { X } ) ) = ( S ` X ) ) |
